text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/medication-status defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
active ActiveThe medication record is current and is appropriate for reference in new instances.
inactive InactiveThe medication record is not current and is not is appropriate for reference in new instances.
entered-in-error Entered in ErrorThe medication record was created erroneously and is not appropriated for reference in new instances.

concept.definition: The medication record is current and is appropriate for reference in new instances.
The medication record is not current and is not is appropriate for reference in new instances.
The medication record was created erroneously and is not appropriated for reference in new instances.
